Reviews.Title: Phone has bad mic
Reviews.Author: Michael J Strugala
Reviews.Content: I will be sending this phone back for a return and full refund. I had high hopes that this phone would work with PagePlus Celluar. Unfortunately, after a week I received this the mic started to malfunction to the point where I could only hear people if I put them on speaker phone. Wish this would of worked out because the price was great!

Reviews.Title: Great phone
Reviews.Author: Jack Karako "mr. jack"
Reviews.Content: Updated from a 16 GB to a 64MB because it has become my all purpose unit even replacing my laptop on business road trips

Reviews.Title: Condition of used phone
Reviews.Author: IowaGuy
Reviews.Content: I was expecting the phone to be in better condition than I received it. One of the speakers doesn't work, AT ALL and there are 2 pretty big dents along the edges of the phone.

Reviews.Title: Perfect Christmas present for my teenager
Reviews.Author: Laughin Bones
Reviews.Content: My teenaged daughter loved her iPhone 4 but only had 16GB of storage for her music and photos (wait! It's a PHONE, right?) so this is the perfect solution. She gets an upgrade on the storage to 64GB and gets Siri without switching to an iPhone 5.  Saves us the huge cost of a new phone 5 which she doesn't want; she keeps the version (iPhone 4) she loves.IMPORTANT:Be sure you check the specific item details to make sure the phone you're buying is the right one for your carrier. We were lucky. The phone we bought said "Verizon" in the description and it only took us a few minutes to get it authorized as a replacement on our Verizon account. Consider asking the seller for the IMEI number (found in General/About/IMEI) to confirm the phone will work or is not stolen BEFORE you buy it. The purchase will take longer but is the only guarantee that once you receive the phone it will work.Hopefully your purchase will be successful like ours

Reviews.Title: I phone 4s
Reviews.Author: Jacquelyn
Reviews.Content: The back of the phone broke the second week, the  was used or  refurbished it had 12 days on the history of the phone also the phone registers as a white phone not black. The site clamed it was new.

Reviews.Title: Good Buy
Reviews.Author: William Yeamans
Reviews.Content: The phone was in great condition, functions very well, only problem is with the battery life, but that is a given when you buy a used phone, the previous owner most likely wore it down. All and all a good buy. The phone was also shipped extreamly fast.

Reviews.Title: Love It!
Reviews.Author: Joni W.
Reviews.Content: After my first iPhone 4s was stolen I knew I wanted another one but was afraid to purchase online.  I was not disappointed the phone was is great shape and is working brilliantly for me!  Thanks

Reviews.Title: NEW...BUT NO WARRANTY
Reviews.Author: Roger Glenn
Reviews.Content: The phones were.probably fine.  The problem was that they were advertised as. "NEW" but their warranties were expired.  In my mind, that negates their new status. They were in fact used and as is and that could be false advertisement.  Also...much too expensive under those circumstances.

Reviews.Title: Best IPhone to date
Reviews.Author: MAS
Reviews.Content: Great phone it is arguably the Best IPhone to date!! The 5,5s,5c pale in comparison. Build, ease of use, perfect design. How do you improve on that? You don't

Reviews.Title: Great after having a droid.
Reviews.Author: MzAmerykah
Reviews.Content: This is my first iPhone. I bought it after my droid phone started acting crazy, losing memory and deleting my photos. I love this phone. I had an iPad before purchasing this phone, so I had no difficulties making the switch from a droid to an iPhone. It needs the ios7 update, which I haven't had the time to download yet.

Reviews.Title: Worth IT TOTALLY
Reviews.Author: A. Holland
Reviews.Content: Works just as I had hoped. My "xpert" kids made it a tough start for me but works great and looks great!!

Reviews.Title: Apple iPhone 4S 64GB
Reviews.Author: counselor
Reviews.Content: The phone was everything that was advertised.  I am very glad I was able to purchase this phone at a reasonable price.

Reviews.Title: reported lost or stolen
Reviews.Author: sb
Reviews.Content: this would have been really great buy but it is almost useless without service... Verizon had this phone listed as lost/ stolen and will not activate it... WTH????????

Reviews.Title: Recant my first review
Reviews.Author: liza
Reviews.Content: I did a good review first time because iPhone arrived quickly and it looked good and turned on, but when I tried to connect 2 months later because I had emergencies that side tracked me from connecting it right away I was informed by Verizon that they couldn't because the phone I was sold was in their records stolen, of course I was so embarrassed because I know I paid for it with my credit card and have proof I got charged and paid my credit card, so I can only think that I got sold a stolen or lost iPhone that I can't use at all.

Reviews.Title: Amazon Warehouse deal is great!
Reviews.Author: Barbara
Reviews.Content: I am not going to review the iPhone 4S--there are millions of reviews out there and I can't add anything.  I love the phone.  I ordered the iPhone 4S 64 GB (Black) Verizon version from Amazon Warehouse deals.  It was described as "Like New".  It WAS new, in a shrink wrapped Apple box, with all accessories in the box as well.  I was able to switch it with my old Samsung Stratosphere, which had a grandfathered "unlimited" data plan, online at the Verizon website, with no problems.  I was able to keep my data plan.  I have had the phone for a day now and it is great!!  Thank you Amazon Warehouse Deals!!

Reviews.Title: Better than described!
Reviews.Author: Jay
Reviews.Content: I know the description says it may be scratched and have some wear, but I got this phone early and it looked brand new. I got the phone about three days early. There was no scratches and appears fresh out of the box. nothing but good things to say. phone looks and works great. Thank you ReBound

Reviews.Title: Not a new phone
Reviews.Author: Don Andrews
Reviews.Content: So, I ordered a "new phone."  Before I ordered it, I even made sure to call to confirm it was a new phone and under warranty.  They assured me it was, new and under warranty.  Of course, the day it arrives I switch everything over, and then the blue tooth doesn't work.  So I call Apple for support and they tell me that the phone is registered to someone else and that it isn't under warranty.  And it's used.  I call Amazon, get into all sorts of cues, get the total run-around and all I get is red tape and a lot of nonsense.  It's a third party seller, so all we can do is return it and you "can try again and then see if you get a new phone."  So in other words, maybe we'll actually tell the truth the next time!  They even tried to get me to buy another phone and then get a refund when I sent the other one back--the nerve!  There is a reason people don't do this, avoid yourself the headache and just pay the extra money and get a real phone.  This experience has made me want to completely quit buying anything through Amazon.  But don't buy phones through Amazon.

Reviews.Title: Got what I deserved
Reviews.Author: Melvin N Browne
Reviews.Content: Purchased used phone advertised as "like new". Although phone arrived in original packaging and all external appearances Iwere as advertised, the phone receiver volume is so low that it is for all practical purposes unusable.  Diagnostic at Apple Store resulted in conclusion that the internal receiver speaker was defective and not repairable. No warranty. Apple offered to exchange for $199, or suggested that I consult my carrier. In the end I have a killer music device but for a phone it, it is about useless. Caveat emptor.

Reviews.Title: Best Purchase Ever
Reviews.Author: Domingo Aponte, Jr.
Reviews.Content: Apple IPhone even better than I could have imagined. Was in great shape and was totally satisfied with this purchase and the seller. Only concern was Fed-X left package on a chair facing the parking lot where I live instead of placing package behind the chair so no one could have seen it. Other than that am a very satisfied customer and will surely recommend using amazon again for future purchases of these king. :)

Reviews.Title: Still a Solid Performer
Reviews.Author: Jaykron
Reviews.Content: Though it's starting to show its age, my iPhone 4s really is a solid overall device. At this price point it's a great entry level phone for those considering switching to iPhone, but don't want to be roped into a long contract. i highly recommend this device, and also purchasing it used from the amazon warehouse store.

Reviews.Title: Very happy...
Reviews.Author: Daniel Fraga
Reviews.Content: Thx for the purchase...it saved me from having to upgrade to the i--five or whatever the current version is.This will give me a few years of breathing room.

Reviews.Title: like new" iPhone 4s 64GB from Advanced Television
Reviews.Author: Im A. Skeptic "Skeptic"
Reviews.Content: The cosmetics were flawless. It came in an iPhone 4s box with the accessories. The short term difficulty with registering it with Verizon were quickly handled by a Technician and then set up with Verizon's Pay-Monthly plan.  Short term use indicates no obvious problem with battery life or working of the iPhone. I find it unfortunate that Apple seems not to take into consideration the "low vision" users when making changes to the IOS. The seller was willing to answer what questions I had that he could.  It is important to realize that purchasing a "not new" product like the iPhone depends as much on the seller as it does on the product.

Reviews.Title: Great phone so far!
Reviews.Author: Dianna W Black
Reviews.Content: Worked as advertised! Hope everyone has as good an experience as I have had. No problems have shown up in the phone with about 1 week of use.

Reviews.Title: Nice
Reviews.Author: D. Holland "FireGuy"
Reviews.Content: After trading some confusing emails back and forth, we finally figured out my address! Who knew I was so hard to find. The phone is excellent and the people were persistent  Thanks for my new phone

Reviews.Title: Great product -- very user friendly
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: The user interface is well done very intuitive.  I really like the bright screen and vivid screen.Down side -- expensive

Reviews.Title: roger venezuela 2013
Reviews.Author: roger
Reviews.Content: very good I recommend it all came as I was a bit slow charm thanks but I congratulate taste good sellers

Reviews.Title: iPhone 4S
Reviews.Author: Sigrid Victor
Reviews.Content: Love this phone.  Have seen and heard this phone is better than iPhone 5 and that is from people who upgraded to iPhone 5.

Reviews.Title: Verizon iPhone 4S
Reviews.Author: Tight/shot/group
Reviews.Content: Watch out for iPhone, I had my iPhone 4S 64gb for less than 5 months and it decided to take a dump on me 2 days ago. Verizon is nice enough to send me a replacement phone but after all the software resets it was determined by the Verizon Rep over the phone that it would have to be a hardware issue. That seems very hard to believe considering my phone was always with a case, and one of the military grade screen protectors on at all times. This phone is in outstanding condition cosmetically but for some reason 2 days ago I go to check my email when I wake up, and the screen turns to a yellow tinge and shuts off with the apple logo. I check the crash reports in settings once I powered it back on, it had crashed 20 times while I was asleep. This may be an isolated incident but at the same time this just shows how Apple products can still be flawed. If this phone is going to be your end all be all, make sure you still have a backup phone. Luckily I had an old BB 9930 lying around that I could still activate in its place. Great phone, just probably 1 bad one in a bunch.
